title: Corona Crushing
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, it’s the Assanté Smith takeover. We share stories of finding new love interests, hooking up and dating during quarantine.

Black Business of the Week - Plant Subscription Service https://grounded-plants.com

Wellness Segment - Laughter is the best Medicine https://www.tiktok.com/@jasonderulo

Thank you to our Sponsors:

Planned Parenthood - Right now, the last thing you need to worry about is your sexual and reproductive health care. That’s why Planned Parenthood is here with you, wherever you are. By phone or video, their medical professionals can provide birth control information and care, STI testing and treatment, emergency contraception, and more. Planned Parenthood knows your care can’t wait - not now, not ever. Book a telehealth appointment with a Planned Parenthood doctor or nurse today. Learn more at https://www.plannedparenthood.org/telehealth

Ben & Jerry’s - Three new Non-Dairy Frozen Desserts are a new twist on vegan euphoria. So many Non-Dairy flavors, so little time. Ben & Jerry’s has three new Non-Dairy Frozen Desserts made with sunflower butter. The Ben & Jerry’s Flavor Gurus have taken a big leap this time. Their new Non-dairy flavors are the perfect sweet treats for vegans, vegetarians and everyone in between! Check out the Ben & Jerry’s sunflower butter lineup, and the whole Non-Dairy family at https://www.benjerry.com

WHOOP - WHOOP is a fitness wearable that provides personalized insights on the performance of your sleep, how recovered your body is, and how much stress and exertion you put on your body throughout the day. Every day when you get up, you get a recovery score based on your HRV, resting heart rate, and sleep performance that can be used as an indicator to how to approach your day. And the app has built in features like the Strain Coach, which gives you target exertion goals to workout optimally for the level of intensity your body is signaling it can handle. Based on how strenuous your day is, the app also has a built in Sleep Coach, which lets you know how much sleep you should be getting — based on your OWN performance goals. WHOOP is offering 15% off with the code FRIENDZONE at checkout. Go to WHOOP, https://www.whoop.com and enter FRIENDZONE at checkout to save 15%. Sleep better, recover faster, and train smarter. Optimize your performance with WHOOP today.

Follow us online:

Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast 

Have a GREAT day!
